name: Dice Of Life
description:
You have a limited time on this earth. One day you will die.

How you spend it... is up to you.

If Time or Health reaches zero. the game is over. Balance your choices with this in mind

Click space to roll
Select event Card
Buy new Tiles for their face value
Rotate with WASD to select face
Left click to upgrade your dice

-----------------------------------------

Done in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 44 - 4/26/2019-4/29/2019 Theme :Your life as currency

This was done in 2 days - approximately 24 hours of design time

Music

Finding the Balance Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
